name: route_randomization
description: Controls the random noise introduced to avoid giving the same routes

name: exploration_percentage
description: Controls the ratio of smart cars used as explorers

name: static_info_weight
description: Controls the importance of static information (i.e. max speed, street length) on routing

name: dynamic_info_weight
description: Controls the importance of static information (i.e. observed traffic) on routing

name: exploration_weight
description: Controls the degree of exploration of the explorers

name: data_freshness_threshold
description: Threshold for considering traffic-related data as stale and disregard them

name: re_routing_frequency
description: Controls how often the router should be invoked to re-route a smart car
